145.content: You see, Daphne and Velma had secretly loved diapers and decided one day they would wear them again. And that is today, when their parents were out, they brought their diaper packs, and took off their panties and taped the diapers on. Daphne said "This is going to be fun." Velma said "Yeah, being diapered with my best friend is a breeze." They hugged and put their diapered butts next to each other, enjoying the comfort.
145.title: They like them.

1451.content:
After examining her diapered butt for a moment Daphne felt her tummy rumble a bit. She liked wearing diapers but she wanted to experience the nice feeling of using them. However she knew that eating and drinking would be possible so she might as well get started. "Say, Velma," the redhead spoke, "Are you feeling hungry?"

A pause occurred between the two. Velma felt her own tummy rumbling and nodded. "Well I am feeling a little bit hungry," her friend answered, "What should we have to eat?"
1451.title: They get hungry.

When opening the fridge Velma noticed something other than soda. There was also some grape juice and a carton of milk. Then, an idea had hid Velma. What if instead of soda they can have a nice, big, baby bottle of...

choices: They eat the burgers and drink the chocolate milk.
1451321.content: She told her idea to Daphne, and she loved it, especially, since they are going to drink milk. Then Daphne had an idea. She smiled as she says "Why don't we drink Chocolate Milk? That way, we can make our poop into a big mess of diarrhea for our diapers! That way we can enjoy it even more!" Velma liked that idea. She smiled and says "Let's do it!" They got some chocolate from the cabinet. They poured the milk in the 2 big baby bottles and then she broke up the chocolate into pieces and put in in both big baby bottles and she closed the bottles with the lids, then she shakes them up as they saw the white Normal milk, mixed with the pieces of yummy chocolate, turn into delicious chocolate milk. Velma has the bottles ready.
1451321.title: Milk

145132111.content:
Then, hours later, their stomachs grumbled. They needed to go now. They both smiled as they stand up. Daphne and Velma playfully said "Oh, we need to go potty. But we don't need to use the big girl potty anymore, because we're wearing diapers. And we gotta poop, and it will be diahreah. So let's go." Daphne and Velma started to push and...
FLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAR T!
FLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAR T!
Sssssssssssssssssssssssssss...
Sssssssssssssssssssssssssss...
Both sighed "Ah...that's better." They now look as their diapers are now huge from the mess. They sit in it and rub back and forth and felt the good mess. Daphne said "This feels good. It was a good idea to use these." Velma said "Yeah. It's so good to do this."

After Daphne and Velma diapered each other, they kept on their normal outfits. Those Daphne's diaper was partly visible from the bottom of her dress, and Velma's diaper poked up from the bottom of her skirt. They spent a few minutes admiring one another before Daphne suggested "Let's go play together!"

"Okay," Velma agreed, "Sounds like fun!"
